website_summaries.verdict: A low-cost option with lots to offer. Similar construction and performance as belts that cost more than double the price.
pros: Provides comfortable back support and easy-to-adjust Velcro closure
Affordably priced and comes with a satisfaction guarantee
cons: Runs large, but this isn't a major concern because it is easy to adjust

customer_reviews.title: Great weightlifting/exercise belt at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 38" waste so I bought the large size which turned out to be perfect. The belt is wider than I expected which is a good thing and provides excellent back and stomach support. It is well made and very sturdy. I like the velcro system of tightening rather than a belt buckle as it allows me to easily and quickly adjust the tightness to any level. My only concern is will the velcro gradually lose its fastening capability over time - a common problem with velcro fasteners that get heavy use. Time will tell. Other than that this belt is exactly what I was looking for at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: shaggybone

customer_reviews.title: This is a great belt for comfort and stability
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt for comfort and stability. It's definitely not a leather belt or anything that stiff, and wouldn't recommend using this for any really heavy powerlifts. The support and flexibility this belt offers is great though when performing Olympic lifts. I ordered a large belt, as I have a 34-36 waist, and unfortunately it's a little big. Which has become more noticible as I've shed a couple of pounds. If you're inbetween sizes I'd recommend going down in size. I plan on buying another belt from this company in a medium size. I don't think you can go wrong with the quality of this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for serious heavy lifters
customer_reviews.text: Do not built for heavy weight lifting. Very flimsy, felt like it was made of cardboard and the velcro came undone every time I tended my core. Might work for a casual lifter but not meant for a gym junkie.
customer_reviews.author: Beauty&Beast

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt for the Dollar
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality weight belt for both beginner and seasoned lifters. I like the Velcro better than a traditional belt because it has infinite size possibilities. Once again, great product. Also, I dealt with their customer support team and they were awesome! So give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: newtriguy

customer_reviews.title: Never used a belt before
customer_reviews.text: I never used a belt before.. however I felt like maybe it was time. I was surprised by the instant positive results. I see why people use them now. Regarding this belt specifically: its not cumbersome nor does it restrict my movements, it was also very supportive. Im not sure why it took me so long to get one. The cost is very reasonable. Im a happy camper. Thx guys good product.
customer_reviews.author: itsonlyme

customer_reviews.title: The velcro held​ better than I expected and provided the perfect cinch or ...
customer_reviews.text: Have always used traditional leather weight belts in the gym that have been very helpful in doing squats and other exercises. However, transporting these heavy leather belts can be a pain. So I wanted to see if I could find another belt that is easier to pack in my gym bag but still provides the needed support during my workouts. Thus far, I think this belt is the answer. The velcro held​ better than I expected and provided the perfect cinch or size. Good purchase. A bonus that the company is family-owned and veteran-operated; as a military veteran, I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Viper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lightweight Lift Belt
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable enough to wear for 8hrs at work. I do not lift weights intentionally, but do lift granite, marble and ceramic tile, hardwood flooring, vinyl plank and tiles, mortar and grout all day long. At the end of the day my back feels better using this belt.
customer_reviews.author: John H Schliewenz Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great back support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the belt for my son. He seems very pleased with the stability and support the belt provides. He has tried other belts from different manufacturers and he has had trouble with all of them as far as the belt not being stable and being too narrow. This belt provides the right amount of lower back support which was my son's main concern . Thank you for making a great product at a very reasonable and affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: DSKEITHLEY

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: The belt performs as expected. Velcro strap holds firm and belt is stiff vertically and wraps around you well. If you're on the low end of the scale, get the next size down. My "navel" measurement is 39" so I figured a large would be good (38-43). I find that the belt can't be tightened enough to give me great pressure. A medium would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Bennett-Sheffield

customer_reviews.title: Best support belt out there
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this belt because I am 48 years old and started going to the gym to get in better shape, my lower back would hurt, I saw this and after getting and trying it, what a great difference i lift heavier without pain and worry. The best support belt I ever used, the strong velcro makes it easy to adjust, totally recommended this belt if your looking for good support
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lifting belt. Great support. Doesn't move around. Is more comfortable than any of the others I've tried. Very durable. Plus it's a veteran owned company. Since you're supposed to wear them tight, if you are on the lower end of a size like me, get the smaller size. I wish I would have. It works great for now, but I'll have to get another once I drop a little weight.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: At first it appeared cheap, but I am the type of person who doesn't care on what it looks like if it does the job. And I have been dead lifting, and doing other heavy lifting exercises such as power cleans, bench etc. So far so good- the belt works well , and feels good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cardona

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: Good material for light and everyday workout at the gym. I will for the first time try it during deadlifts tomorrow. So far I have been using it for every workout except legs and deadlifts. I think I got one size too much. Wanted to return it but the hassles with that discouraged me.
customer_reviews.author: Dewing Idemudia

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this belt, and it is the best belt I ever had! I bought it because I needed something fast, but I didn't hope to get something as good as this. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Slobodan

customer_reviews.title: The back support is awesome
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were uncertain about the size to get him, because of his weigh loss. We decided that a large would be suitable. After receiving the belt we quickly realized that was the wrong size. We reached out to the Fire team customer service and they were more than helpful. They quickly assisted us with our issue and my husband is pleased with his weight belt. Will definitely purchase from them again.
customer_reviews.author: CL Thomas

customer_reviews.title: ... by the size chart and purchased the large belt like it said
customer_reviews.text: I went by the size chart and purchased the large belt like it said, it would become a little loose and slip every time I inhaled. I have since then purchased the medium size belt and it fits perfectly. It was very easy to send back the other belt. The belt is very comfortable, supportive, yet flexible I'm very happy with this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Marie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Belt!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent belt! First, accurate size chart. Second, in addition to strong Velcro there is a keeper on the buckle so the belt is secure. I use it when I hike with a pack it provides good support. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Great Belt
customer_reviews.text: Great Belt with great support. I go to the gym daily and belt provide the perfect support Make sure order the correct Size. Fantastic customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Kaveh

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: In all honesty I ordered the wrong size, then re-order the correct size. After contacting Fire Team Fit they resolved my mistake. As far as the belt goes it is the first one I have ever owned, but seams to work fine and looks to be good quality. Would definitely order from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a great belt. Plenty of support, tight hold and very comfortable to wear. Does nor restrict movements and provides great support.
customer_reviews.author: lrkap

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BELT!
customer_reviews.text: ORIGINALLY THOUGHT THE LARGE WOULD BE A BIT TOO BIG, BUT AFTER TRYING IT AT THE GYM DURING A FEW LIFTS, IT IF PERFECT. BOTH ENDS OF THE BELT OVERLAP RIGHT OVER MY BELLY BUTTON, GIVING ME A LITTLE MORE SUPPORT EXACTLY WHERE I NEED IT. I HAVE A SMALL UMBILICAL HERNIA, AND THIS BELT REALLY HELPS ME.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! I had never worn a weight lifting belt before and I found my back was getting sore after lifts. I have been using this for a couple of weeks now and my back is feeling great.. One more thing. Great customer service! I bought a large belt based on the sizing chart. I measured 39”, right on the edge of needing a medium or large. I contacted customer service and asked if I could exchange for a medium. They promptly responded and said they would send me a medium and to keep the large and share it at the gym. I would definitely recommend this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Skattie

customer_reviews.title: Just received
customer_reviews.text: It looks really sturdy that what I was going for. I just received the package here in Afghanistan. I should using it here in a few days. I have used it several times and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Joellaird

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Belt!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Fits as described. Light weight but very sturdy. I’m 6’2” and I like the width of the belt all the way around. Long Velcro strap is ideal for adjusting to perfect fit and provides a strong hold. Great support. Very pleased all around.
customer_reviews.author: BDL

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift, however I did the measuring. Disappointed that it runs small. Usable, but does not overlap as instructions say it should.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: first lifting belt
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, it fits well and it works exactly like i would expect. It is easily adjusted, and provides excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: B. E. McCloughan

customer_reviews.title: Great belt.
customer_reviews.text: The belt works the way it's supposed to. Mine seems to be just a tad big but I could have measured incorrectly too. Quality wise it seems top notch. Solid stitching and materials. Overall I would reccomend this belt to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: NandA S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent belt!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt ....I also use it to support my back when I read. I read for hours at a time and this belt is supportive and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: MsMgmt

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wish I had bought it smaller.
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the product. I only wish I had ordered the medium instead of the large. When I measured myself, I was just barely in the large category. After seeing how much much adjustment there is in the belt, I wish I had gone with the medium. None the less it seems to be as it is described and fits nicely in my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Don McMillon

customer_reviews.title: since my waist measurement is 42" I ordered a "large" ...
customer_reviews.text: since my waist measurement is 42" I ordered a "large" which should go up to 43" As it turns out the belt is a tad too big. In order to get it to fit correctly I have to put a folded wash cloth under it so that's it's tight enough to provide back support. Other than the fit issue, it's very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product I've bought from Fire Team Fit, the first one being their wrist straps. First, they have perhaps the best customer support I've encountered. They always send follow up emails to check for satisfaction and it really makes for a great experience. The belt is nothing short of amazing. I measured around my navel to get 38' and bought the large on the advice of other users and it fits great. It's very comfortable and well made. I highly recommend the product to any degree of weightlifter!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G McGee

customer_reviews.title: Works as described, check sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought belt to relieve my lower back pain. I'm an order filler so always on my feet and bending and lifting. This is helping. Excellent customer service! Check sizing I ordered a LG and too big based off sizing chart. Emailed them and a medium was sent at no charge
customer_reviews.author: A. Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Belt delivers solid support while lifting.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this belt for a few workouts now. I like it quite a bit. The support seems solid as I move from one lift to another throughout my workouts, squats, deads, press, bench, whatever. The velcro seems to hold just fine and the support I want is there. Thanks for making a great product. Its a pleasure to support a veteran owned company as vet myself. Semper Fi!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Fits pretty good. I hurt my back lifting weights at ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty good. I hurt my back lifting weights at 70 years of age. Coming off a 10 year layoff and got carried away when I started to get results. Use it for a brace while my back healed also. Almost ready to go again. Hooah..
customer_reviews.author: RUFUS

customer_reviews.title: Great lifting belt, sure beats hurting your back!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made belt, easy to use and latch system is fantastic! Great customer service as well. Great addition to my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Rick King

customer_reviews.title: Very good belt. Looking for XL size
customer_reviews.text: I tried number of belts and I think this the the best. It really works. I use it in gym in my garden work where I lift heavy weights. It supports my back and I feel much better. Thank you Fire Team for good product. Only think I wish is if cold make this belt XL size. My waist 43 inches and large size is a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: Mmike47

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome product. I like how the back part fits ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I like how the back part fits nicely into my back and stabilizes it. It has a nice tight fit and isn't bulky. The velcro strap is strong and the belt doesn't cut into me like other belts I've had in the past. From one veteran to another, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a great price. Needed to replace belt for a larger size and the process was completely painless. My request was handled promptly and effectively on a Sunday afternoon. Fire Team Fit really stands 100% behind their products. I would definitely recommend this belt to other customers.
customer_reviews.author: Settled Nomad

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I would definitely recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I never used a weight belt before. I need to get one because my back was scream at me after deadlifts. Great product. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This belt does give that "secure" you want to have when you are pulling or pushing a lot of weight.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like a new bodybuilder
customer_reviews.text: My husband requested a new weight lifting belt as his was shredding!! He works out 4 days a week for over 30 years!! He said THIS BELT made him feel like a new bodybuilder, it was so fantastic. He LOVES IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl E. Groth

customer_reviews.title: after wearing I was like it is pretty much the same or worse as ...
customer_reviews.text: UH dunno, after wearing I was like it is pretty much the same or worse as the one the gym hands out for free. .. so do what you want. BUT BELTING is IMPORTANT. Stay safe use good form. You're not there to impress
customer_reviews.author: Andrew David

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boyfriend for his birthday last year and he still uses it! It’s great back support and it’s durable too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and works like a charm. Easy to get on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: It gives me the support and warms up the muscle.
customer_reviews.author: Earl Bastian

customer_reviews.title: Best belt ever!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt, I just started weigh lifting and this belt helped me get better posture so I don't hurt myself. Also I'm ordered a large it fits well and true to size
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great weight belt.
customer_reviews.text: What a great belt ! I had what I thought was a leather belt from the sports store but it has a layer of papper in the middle witch caused it to tear. No paper in this belt. Awesome product !
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Easy purchase, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great customer service. Belt is well made. I am right on the border of sizes and when the first one I got was a little too big, seller exchanged with no issues. Will buy again from this seller for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Afraid of buying the wrong size? Don’t worry!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a reasonable price! I’ve used it a few times now for Olympic weightlifting and it’s been a great addition. Also I don’t know how I accidentally ordered a large but I did. I messaged the company and they told me to give it to a friend and they said they would send me a medium. How amazing right?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. great Customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the large belt. Well it was a little to big. I contacted the company and quickly got a reply. No questions asked just sorry to hear that and we will send you the medium belt. The belt fits great and the clasp holds real tight. I was worried because ones I had tried in the past the Velcro would slip as I squatted. This does not move.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Kampmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great belt for people with lower back issues.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this belt as a novice lifter for lower back support. It does a good job of that. It is not competition legal but works for my barbell routine.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied with the belt,it does what it’s designed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hylton

customer_reviews.title: A+ weight belt I got a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good weight belt it fits both women and men and it's attractive high quality belt for a good price! I feel I got a great deal! A+
customer_reviews.author: Kkbcareer

customer_reviews.title: A little larger than i expected, and a tad ...
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than i expected, and a tad uncomfortable how it sits. But its a decent weight belt.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice belt
customer_reviews.text: I found the quality of this belt to be great.It gives me plenty of support when I lift weights and the sizing on the belt was as advertised,also I love the Velcro closure system.Thanks for making a great lifting belt.
customer_reviews.author: oohrah67

customer_reviews.title: great choice for a fitness belt!
customer_reviews.text: the belt is easy to use, comfortable to wear and fairly light weight. This is my first time trying one of these and I am very pleased with the one I chose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look, feel and adjustability of the belt. I use it for powerlifting, I had never used one before and I believe this is a good starting point. It has definitely helped me get my numbers up a bit. And as someone who avoids animal products it is definitely a good belt.
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: because I want to maintain good form moving forward
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to ordering this product, but when my belt arrived, I tried it on. I think I may have needed a size medium, but I think I can make it work, because I want to maintain good form moving forward, and I meet with my trainer in three days. I like the compactness, fabric and color if the product. I
customer_reviews.author: mary anne sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is wrong/doesn't stay put.
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this 3 stars because it didn't fit well, size chart is off and mine was slightly too big. While trying this belt out it doesn't stay in place and is very slippery while wearing it. I don't see how this belt would stay put using any weights.
customer_reviews.author: J. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great belt!!
customer_reviews.text: Great belt and very stable/durable. Sizing was correct and definitely supported my back during heavy lifts! FTF is a veteran-owned company so that makes it a plus as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and support
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and support. Way more comfortable than the traditional leather belt.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer F.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from Fire Team Fit
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the belt in black, and it's great. If I ever need another belt, or other weightlifting gear, know I'll be going for Fire Team Fit!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: The belt helps me with more support when the bottom ...
customer_reviews.text: The belt helps me with more support when the bottom back of it is positioned against the top back of the pelvis just below the lumbar spine if you position the back of it just low enough to do so.
customer_reviews.author: In my opinion.

customer_reviews.title: Great belt
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Adjustable fit and amazing back support. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Karl O.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! While working out, i injured my lower back. I was able to work out again with this belt. It helped a lot. I continue to use it to prevent getting injured again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Received belt 2 days after ordering. Belt fits nicely not to bulky for a females frame. I like the Velcro instead of buckle that way it adjusts for a better fit. It's true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Lawton

customer_reviews.title: good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: i had it for a few month, i liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good Back Support
customer_reviews.text: It is very good. A little stiff to begin with but after a few uses it is more comfortable. Primary benefit is that it provides security and confidence with heavy weights. Also excellent back support.
customer_reviews.author: Desmond McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: it's easy too put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: I've tried different weightlifting belts and this belt can be use for lifting weights and for work that requires lifting. it's easy too put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lind

customer_reviews.title: The belt is very comfortable. I purchased the belt to wear daily to ...
customer_reviews.text: The belt is very comfortable. I purchased the belt to wear daily to support my lower back. I hurt my lower back lifting a heavy object several months ago and started having issues with my lower back. I am very pleased so far with the support to my back. I difinately recommend this belt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: strong support
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this at work when ever I have to lift heavy objects. Its of good quality and seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Good belt for doing squats.
customer_reviews.text: good working belt. I like the strength of the velcro strap. Good support in the back area. I would recommend this product to a friend especially at that price point.
customer_reviews.author: Van Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: very good product.
customer_reviews.text: In the gym,this is my third,I leave one in every location I work out.
customer_reviews.author: DERRICK PERSAUD

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A little lose cuz of the size I ordered but works good.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.  Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and comfortable. Highly adjustable. I am very happy with this belt. I wear size 38 pants and the Large size belt I ordered is plenty big.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: The belt is sturdy and litght weight
customer_reviews.text: The belt is sturdy and litght weight. The only problem I have is the sizing. I purchase a medium and it was very tight. Had to stretch the fabric to make it fit. I exchanged the belt with no problems to a large size. The large is a little big but will keep it. I really like the product and am considering purchasing the medium in addition to the large.
customer_reviews.author: Bernd A. Harrer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Weight belt extremely comfortable with lots of support. Excellent customer service. I will be buying more products from Fire Team fit and recommending them to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlyn Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Exactly what you are wanting!
customer_reviews.text: This belt is absolutely incredible. It feels exactly how you wish it would. As sturdy as a leather belt, but with the lightweight comfort. I even wore it under my shirt and it wasn't even noticeable in case you wanted to know how perfectly it conforms to your body. Highly recommended here! Great, great, product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Good, adjustable belt.
customer_reviews.text: Good, light weight adjustable belt. I’ve only used it a couple of times but it seems to be durable and a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent to protect upper stomach hernia and back.
customer_reviews.text: Five stars for quality. Five stars for goodness of fit. Five stars for excellent service. This belt really helps and I thank you for this. I am recommending this belt for everyone. Protects back and stomach. I am buying a second belt to keep in my gym bag. I am really happy. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Berger

customer_reviews.title: Great Company and Product
customer_reviews.text: So far I have very much enjoyed my new belt. It’s very supportive, easy to strap tight, and great for each lift. I also had a bit of a sizing issue and reached out to the company directly; they were fantastic and super helpful in getting me the correct size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent belt. No need to look any further. Buy this one. Make sure the front overlaps. It's such great support.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves this belt
customer_reviews.text: My husband hurt his back a while back and his doctor recommended he purchase a belt like this to wear at times. He is very happy with this belt and he says it helps him to remember not to over do while working.
customer_reviews.author: BDawson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: I have degenerative disk disease in my lower back and this belt helps tremendously in supporting my back especially since I have to lift heavy stuff at work.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin White

customer_reviews.title: Good belt!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome belt, super supportive. Velcro has held up so far!! I would definitely recommend for the average gym goer!

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very great product, it is of great quality and provides optimal back support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMPANY EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: Super super happy with this product! Belt is easy to put on, feels comfortable, and has an amazing amount of support for my lower back during heavy lifting exercises. I also ordered the wrong size by accident, and they sent me a new one in the right size for free. Couldn't be any happier with this product, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The belt fits very nicely and doesn't feel like I'm wearing a belt too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made well I will have to return it for a medium tho, too loose

customer_reviews.title: The product seemed like it might be good but I should have listened ...
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed like it might be good but I should have listened to many previous reviews that stated the size chart isn't correct. My size, according the chart, should have been a large. Instead, it was still not tight when snugged up as far as I could get it. Sent it back and I'll be trying the next size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: blackdoghotel

customer_reviews.title: WORKS FINE. WASN'T QUITE THE BARGAIN I THOUGHT WHEN I ...
customer_reviews.text: WORKS FINE. WASN'T QUITE THE BARGAIN I THOUGHT WHEN I PRICED IT AGAINST ONE I SAW AT BIG 5. BUT...
customer_reviews.author: Ed Bilby

customer_reviews.title: ... than a year was looking for something light with good back support
customer_reviews.text: Been doing cross fit for more than a year was looking for something light with good back support. I have a 36 waist and I'm 230lbs could of went a size down but its right on the border of getting a new one. Velcro is strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to help me keep my back stable ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me keep my back stable while I lift and it does! No more back pain from improper form.
customer_reviews.author: Tracee

customer_reviews.title: Quality belt and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Provides great support for lower back. Velcro is strong and the fit is great. Customer support is readily available for questions. Great product, great company!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great belt but..
customer_reviews.text: Great lifting belt it’s well made I would recommend to anyone to try it out, but unfortunately they don’t have any bigger sizes other then (L) Large wish they could make bigger ones at least up to 2XL for us bigger folks but other then that I give the belt five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like this belt until I left it at the gym and somebody else is now enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nylon weight lifting belt
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and strong weight lifting belt. It fits very well and I like the way it adjusts. It exceeded my expectations and I would recommend this belt anyone looking for a quality belt
customer_reviews.author: Thomas j Todora!

customer_reviews.title: Quality Construction
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality! This belt is very well made. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: mbeauchamp

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, supportive but not restrictive
customer_reviews.text: This belt feel great on, its lightweight and you can barely tell it's on, yet it gives great support.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rockhold

customer_reviews.title: Great belt. Fits very well
customer_reviews.text: Great belt. Fits very well, I got the large and though I wear a 40 to 42 pant size, this thing fits me well and snugly. Ive worked out with it twice now and both times it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fire Team Fit Weight Lifting Belt for Men and Women, 6 Inch, Bodybuilding & Fitness Back Support for Cross Training Workout, Squats, Lunges
